metadata.description: Key player injury and availability tracker for World Cup 2026
metadata.notes: Data sourced from verified sports news outlets. Availability statuses: fit, minor_concern, doubt, major_doubt, injured, long_term_injured, retired_international

lastMatchPlayed.notes: Returned to team training Feb 13, declared available

players.source: beIN Sports, Managing Madrid, FOX Sports, SI.com - Feb 2026
players.notes: Sprained left knee Dec 2025, returned early for Supercopa final (11 days vs recommended recovery). Missed training mid-Feb but returned Feb 13. Recurring knee discomfort being managed. Expected fit for World Cup barring setback.

lastMatchPlayed.notes: Left match in tears with less than 10 minutes on clock

players.source: beIN Sports, Goal.com, FOX Sports, GB News - Feb 18, 2026
players.notes: Injury worse than first feared. Will miss England's final pre-WC camp (March friendlies vs Uruguay and Japan). England boss Tuchel described it as 'a race against time'. If physically fit, expected to be selected. England opens WC vs Croatia June 17.

lastMatchPlayed.notes: Scored first goal of 2026 but exited 57th minute with hamstring strain

players.source: Goal.com, SI.com, Al Jazeera, FIFA.com, Yahoo Sports - Feb 2026
players.notes: Age 38. Not retired from international football. Said 'the most logical thing is that I won't make it' due to age but remains 'excited and motivated'. Needs consistent playing time and fitness. Argentina in Group J (Algeria, Austria, Jordan). Likely final World Cup if he plays.

Age 41. Will be at record 6th World Cup. Portugal qualified with 9-1 rout of Armenia (Ronaldo was suspended for that match). Revealed he was nursing a knock during 2025 Nations League final but played through. Not expected to play every minute. Coach Martinez managing his workload.

lastMatchPlayed.notes: Came off at half-time with niggles, rested vs Salford (FA Cup)

players.source: SI.com, Sports Mole, Manchester City official - Feb 2026
players.notes: Norway qualified for first World Cup since 1998 with perfect 8-0 record. Haaland scored 16 goals in qualifying (tied Lewandowski's record). Guardiola confirmed 'fully fit' for Newcastle match. Minor management issue, not a significant injury concern.

lastMatchPlayed.notes: Played 90 minutes, scored 1 goal, received yellow card

players.notes: 9 goals, 5 assists in La Liga 2025/26. Brazil coach Ancelotti stated Vinicius must be '100% fit' to make WC squad. Currently in strong form with goals in 3 consecutive matches (Real Sociedad, Benfica, Osasuna). Under UEFA investigation for alleged racial incident vs Benfica.

players.injuryType: Knee surgery (chronic knee problem, previous ACL tear)
players.source: FOX Sports, ESPN, Goal.com, FIFA.com - Feb 2026
players.notes: Age 34. Underwent knee surgery Dec 2025 following previous ACL tear that cost him a year. Returned to Santos. Ancelotti said he must be '100%, not 80%' to make squad. Neymar promised fans: 'We are going to do the impossible to bring the sixth title.' Admitted 2026 retirement is 'possible'. Race against time.

lastMatchPlayed.notes: Injured while scoring from penalty spot. 116+ days sidelined.

players.source: FOX Sports, TSN, GB News, Yahoo Sports - Feb 2026
players.notes: Age 34. Joined Napoli from Man City as free agent summer 2025. High-grade lesion in same area as previous surgery. Only made 8 Serie A appearances before injury. Rehab in Belgium with specialist. Could return to light training in March but narrow window to regain match fitness before WC squad selection. Major blow for Belgium.

lastMatchPlayed.notes: Confirmed out for approximately one month

players.source: ESPN, FOX Sports, beIN Sports, Tribuna.com - Feb 2026
players.notes: Expected to return by end of February. Should be fit for Finalissima (Spain vs Argentina, March 27). History of recurring injuries throughout career. Spain expects to have him available for World Cup. Positive spirits during recovery.

lastMatchPlayed.notes: Back to near-best form after radiofrequency treatment

players.source: ESPN, Football-Espana, World Soccer Talk - Feb 2026
players.notes: Underwent minor radiofrequency intervention in Belgium that was the turning point. Issue 'practically gone' since November. However, it is an overuse injury that worsens without proper rest - needs ongoing management. Tension between Barcelona and RFEF over workload management. Expected fit for WC.

players.injuryType: Stress fracture in right foot (rare bone injury)

lastMatchPlayed.notes: Suffered injury at end of match

players.source: Sky Sports, Arsenal.com, Daily Cannon, Tribuna.com - Feb 2026
players.notes: Surgery on Feb 9, 2026. Father described it as 'not very documented' stress fracture. Out for remainder of domestic season. Slim chances of recovery in time for WC (return could be early August per Arteta). Spain coach expressed concern. Would need to be fit by late May/early June for squad selection.

lastMatchPlayed.notes: Limped off in second half, collision with Santiago Bueno. Completed post-match media duties.

players.source: Arsenal.com, FourFourTwo, Arsenal Insider, NBC Sports - Feb 2026
players.notes: Minor knock, expected available for Tottenham derby Feb 22. No significant injury concern for World Cup. Key player for England's campaign.

lastMatchPlayed.notes: Missed training Feb 4 due to illness, also previous calf/facial injuries

players.notes: Multiple minor injuries throughout 2025-26 season (calf, ankle Oct 2025, facial injury, illness Feb 2026). None appear to be long-term concerns. Missed England friendly vs Wales with ankle issue in Oct 2025. Pattern of minor niggles but consistently returns.

lastMatchPlayed.notes: Sustained hamstring injury during AFCON match vs Ghana. Out 21-28 days.

players.notes: Age 33. Egypt qualified for WC unbeaten (8W, 2D, 26 pts). Salah scored 9 goals in qualifying with a brace vs Djibouti to clinch qualification. Hamstring injury during AFCON 2026 was more serious than first thought. Reports of possible Liverpool departure on loan. Likely his final World Cup.

players.injuryType: No current injury (minor muscle issues in season)

lastMatchPlayed.notes: Scored match-winning goal in 1-2 away victory

players.notes: Age 40 (born Sep 9, 1985). Would be 40 at WC, making this his 5th World Cup (2006, 2014, 2018, 2022, 2026). Joined AC Milan from Real Madrid on free transfer Jul 2025. Stated winning the World Cup with Croatia is his final goal before retirement. Currently performing well in Serie A.

Age 33. Moved to LAFC from Tottenham Aug 2025 for $26.5M (MLS record). Missed WC qualifying matches with hamstring injury (Sep 2024) and foot injury (Jun 2025). Coach Hong Myung-bo said he won't push banged-up captain too hard. Fitness management ongoing. South Korea coach says Son must 'forget his Tottenham woes'.

lastMatchPlayed.notes: Third injury of 2025-26 season. Currently dealing with bursitis near hip.

players.source: ESPN, World Soccer Talk, SI.com, Pro Football Network - Feb 2026
players.notes: Hamstring tear Oct 2025 on international duty sidelined him nearly a month. Now bursitis near hip. Zero goals in 2026 (4 goals since Oct return, all before Jan). Pochettino concerned about constant unavailability. When fit, he is 'undroppable' for USMNT. USA are co-hosts, opening June 11.

players.injuryType: Right hamstring torn muscle fibre (new), previous ACL tear
players.expectedReturn: TBD (3-6 weeks typical for muscle fibre tear)

lastMatchPlayed.notes: Forced off at 47th minute with new hamstring injury

players.source: Tribuna.com, TSN, Yahoo Sports, SI.com, beIN Sports - Feb 21, 2026
players.notes: JUST INJURED TODAY. Tore right ACL in March 2025 (vs USA, CONCACAF Nations League). Only recently returned from that long-term injury in January 2026. Now new muscle fibre tear in right hamstring. 111 days until World Cup. Canada coach Marsch said Davies 'ready for World Cup and excited'. Canada are co-hosts. Very concerning timing.
